De cauterizacio de fistula en la boca.	The procedure you're referring to, "de cauterización de una fístula en la boca" in Spanish, translates to "burn-off treatment of a gum fistula in the mouth" in English. This medical procedure involves using heat or chemicals to destroy the tissue around an abscess (fistula) in the mouth to prevent further infection and promote healing. It is usually performed under local anesthesia by a dental surgeon or periodontist. Please note that this treatment should only be considered after thorough evaluation, as it's not suitable for all types of gum fistulas, and there are various alternative treatments available depending on the specific case.

E aquesta es la forma del cauteri:	It seems like you've mentioned "cauterization" but haven't provided the specific form or context. Cauterization is a medical procedure where tissue is burned to remove or close off a part of it, typically for stopping bleeding, preventing infection, or removing abnormal growths.

La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of vertical farming that uses aquatic plants to grow crops is known as Aquaponics. In this system, fish and plants are grown together in a symbiotic environment. The waste produced by the fish provides an organic nutrient source for the plants, while the plants help to filter and clean the water, which is then recirculated back to the fish tanks. This closed-loop system allows for efficient use of resources and can be highly productive in terms of crop yield per square foot compared to traditional soil farming methods. Aquaponics combines aquaculture (raising aquatic animals) and hydroponics (cultivating plants in water without soil) into one integrated system, often used for growing leafy greens like lettuce, as well as herbs and other vegetables that thrive in such conditions.

Venous flap thrombectomy is a surgical procedure that involves the removal of blood clots (thrombi) from veins, primarily to restore normal blood flow and prevent complications such as post-thrombotic syndrome or chronic venous insufficiency. This technique may be applied in various situations, including deep vein thrombosis (DVT), phlebothrombectomy (clot removal from superficial veins), or during the treatment of complications related to venous disease. The procedure can be performed using different techniques such as open surgery, endovascular methods (using catheters and stents), or minimally invasive approaches with specialized devices.

This event takes place every two years during even-numbered years when a new Congress convenes. The primary serves as a way for political parties to select and nominate candidates who will run in general elections, aiming to secure the majority of seats in the House of Representatives.
